name.baseName: Preparation ; Chinese patent medicine ; Boiling and lifting products ; Liquid preparation ; greater than or equal to200 t - Chinese patent medicine/a; NESPS2
制剂 ; 中成药 ; 煮提产物 ; 液体制剂 ; 大于等于200吨-中成药/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65
technology.technologicalApplicability: 此数据集表征了中成药液体制剂的大规模生产过程，产量达到或超过每年200吨。数据反映了中药液体制剂制造过程中煮提阶段的操作，并列出了产生的不同类型污染的尾端处理技术。这些处理技术包括采用好氧和厌氧生物法来管理废水、化学需氧量、氨氮、总磷和有机结合氮，由此表明了其在注重可持续废弃物管理实践的药品制造设施中的适用性。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码27,四级代码2740文件，在完整版文件中第3089页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为中成药，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual normal operating time of wastewater treatment equipment (hours) / annual operating time of production system (hours)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理化学处理法，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总磷

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management75，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual normal operating time of wastewater treatment equipment (hours) / annual operating time of production system (hours)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为75，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management62
